subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Officials of the players union, and Donald Fehr, assert that the former leader of the union that represents baseball players, refused to confirm that Fehr will be the new leader of the hockey players union.
snippet: Officials of the players union, and Donald Fehr, assert that the former leader of the union that represents baseball players, refused to confirm that Fehr will be the new leader of the hockey players union.
